TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSourceCreationData extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用於在本機電腦或遠端電腦上建立事件記錄檔來源的組態設定。

span.span: Represents the configuration settings used to create an event log source on the local computer or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以設定當地語系化的項目寫入事件記錄檔的新來源。Use the class to configure a new source for writing localized entries to an event log. 您不需要使用這個類別來讀取事件記錄檔。It is not necessary to use this class to read from an event log. 這個類別會定義新的事件來源和其相關聯的事件記錄檔的組態設定。This class defines the configuration settings for a new event source and its associated event log. 相關聯的事件記錄檔可以位於本機電腦或遠端電腦上。The associated event log can be on the local computer or a remote computer. 若要建立新的或現有的事件記錄檔的新來源本機電腦上，設定並的屬性，並呼叫方法。To create a new source for a new or existing event log on the local computer, set the and properties of an and call the method. 這個方法會建立您在中指定的事件來源屬性，並註冊其事件記錄檔中指定。This method creates the event source you specify in the property and registers it for the event log specified in . 此行為會類似於使用類別，來註冊事件來源的事件記錄檔。This behavior is similar to using the class to register an event source for an event log. 使用和將事件寫入事件記錄檔的方法。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 您必須指定要寫入事件，事件來源您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而您嘗試寫入新的來源的事件寫入作業將會失敗。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 您可以設定新的來源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 您可以建立現有的事件記錄檔或新的事件記錄檔的事件來源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 當您建立新的事件記錄檔的新來源時，系統會註冊為該記錄檔中，來源，但直到第一個項目寫入至其中，才會建立記錄檔。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 每個來源只能寫入一個事件記錄檔一次;不過，您的應用程式也可以使用多個來源，以寫入多個事件記錄檔。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔。For example, your application might need multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 若要變更現有的來源的設定詳細資料，您必須刪除來源，並再建立新的組態。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他應用程式或元件使用現有的來源，請使用更新的組態，而不是刪除現有來源建立新的來源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. 您可以在您的事件類別目錄和訊息字串的當地語系化資源註冊事件來源。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄項目使用資源識別碼，而不是指定實際的字串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您可以註冊個別的檔案，如事件類別目錄、 訊息和參數插入字串，或您可以註冊相同的資源檔，所有的三種類型的字串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和屬性來設定要當地語系化的項目寫入事件記錄檔的來源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果您的應用程式會將字串值，直接寫入事件記錄檔，您不需要設定這些屬性。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定的來源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用寫入使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔之事件的方法。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 比方說，使用資源檔，設定一個來源，然後使用該來源中的方法寫入事件記錄檔的資源識別項的項目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定事件來源的組態屬性，從命令列引數。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 輸入引數會指定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱、 電腦名稱和事件訊息資源檔。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 在程式碼範例會確認來源沒有與現有事件來源，衝突，並接著會建立新的事件來源，為指定的事件記錄檔。The code example verifies that the source does not conflict with an existing event source, and then creates the new event source for the specified event log. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string source, string logName) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As String, logName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 使用事件記錄檔登錄作為項目來源的名稱。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.

param.name: logName
param.span: 來源中的項目要寫入的記錄檔名稱。

span.span: The name of the log to which entries from the source are written.

summary.span: 會利用指定的事件來源和事件記錄檔名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified event source and event log name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將項目寫入事件記錄檔中，您必須先建立事件記錄檔的事件來源。To write entries to an event log, you must first create an event source for the event log. 若要註冊新的來源，初始化執行個體，請設定您的應用程式，並呼叫的執行個體屬性方法。To register a new source, initialize an instance, configure the instance properties for your application, and call the method. 來源註冊之後，您可以從來源使用寫入項目或方法。After the source is registered, you can write entries from the source using the or methods. 您可以在您的事件類別目錄和訊息字串的當地語系化資源註冊事件來源。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄項目使用資源識別碼，而不是指定實際的字串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您可以註冊個別的檔案，如事件類別目錄、 訊息和參數插入字串，或您可以註冊相同的資源檔，所有的三種類型的字串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和屬性來設定要當地語系化的項目寫入事件記錄檔的來源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果您的應用程式會將字串值，直接寫入事件記錄檔，您不需要設定這些屬性。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定的來源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 比方說，使用資源檔，設定一個來源，然後使用該來源中的方法寫入事件記錄檔的資源識別項的項目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的方法，將字串直接寫入事件記錄檔。Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log. 下表顯示的初始屬性值的。The following table shows initial property values for an . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`source` 參數。The `source` parameter.| ||`logName` 參數。The `logName` parameter.| ||在本機電腦 ("。")。The local computer (".").| ||零Zero| ||`null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||`null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||`null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您決定是否事件來源名為`SampleApplicationSource`登錄在本機電腦上。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最後，程式碼範例會將設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`中的資源檔路徑和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CategoryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CategoryCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定分類資源檔中的分類數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

value.span: 分類資源檔中的分類數目。

span.span: The number of categories in the category resource file.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和屬性，以寫入事件的當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果當您撰寫的事件時，會提供類別，事件檢視器會顯示事件項目的類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來協助篩選事件，或提供事件的進一步資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event. 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，針對不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別目錄都無所謂，如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您決定是否事件來源名為`SampleApplicationSource`登錄在本機電腦上。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最後，程式碼範例會將設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`中的資源檔路徑和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

exception.span: 屬性會設定為負數或設定為大於 的值。

Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CategoryResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CategoryResourceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的分類字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
The path of the category resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和屬性，以寫入事件的當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果當您撰寫的事件時，會提供類別，事件檢視器會顯示事件項目的類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來協助篩選事件，或提供事件的進一步資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event. 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，針對不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別目錄都無所謂，如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您決定是否事件來源名為`SampleApplicationSource`登錄在本機電腦上。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最後，程式碼範例會將設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`中的資源檔路徑和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LogName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LogName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要讓來源寫入項目的事件記錄檔名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the event log to which the source writes entries.
The name of the event log.

value.span: 這可以是應用程式、系統或自訂的記錄檔名稱。

span.span: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
The default value is "Application."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來識別您的應用程式以使用新的來源將項目寫入事件記錄檔。Use the property to identify the event log that your application writes entries to using the new source. 事件記錄檔可以是新的記錄檔或現有的記錄檔。The event log can be a new log or an existing log. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果您沒有明確設定屬性預設為應用程式記錄檔的事件記錄檔。If you do not explicitly set the property, the event log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 安全性記錄檔是唯讀的。The Security log is read-only. 若要以新來源的現有記錄檔為目標，設定屬性設為現有的事件記錄檔名稱。To target an existing log for the new source, set the property to the existing event log name. 若要建立新的事件記錄檔的來源，您必須設定屬性。To create a new event log for the source, you must set the property. 事件記錄檔名稱必須由可列印字元組成，不得包括字元 '\*'、'?' 或 '\\'。Event log names must consist of printable characters, and cannot include the characters '\*', '?', or '\\'. 事件記錄檔名稱的前 8 個字元必須是不同於現有的名稱指定的電腦上的事件記錄檔的前 8 個字元。The first 8 characters of the event log name must be different from the first 8 characters of existing names of event logs on the specified computer. 作業系統會將事件記錄檔儲存為檔案。The operating system stores event logs as files. 當您使用或方法用來建立新的事件記錄檔，相關聯的檔案會儲存在指定的電腦上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目錄。When you use or the method to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 檔案名稱由附加的前 8 個字元設定".evt"副檔名的屬性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定事件來源的組態屬性，從命令列引數。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 輸入引數會指定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱、 電腦名稱和事件訊息資源檔。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MachineName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MachineName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要註冊事件來源的電腦名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which to register the event source.

value.span: 要註冊事件來源的系統名稱。

span.span: The name of the system on which to register the event source.
The default is the local computer (".").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值不可為空字串。The value cannot be an empty string. 如果未明確設定的電腦名稱，則預設為本機電腦 ("。")。If the machine name is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer ("."). 註冊時在遠端電腦上的來源，您必須具有系統管理權限，具有足夠權限的登錄值寫入該電腦上。When registering a source on a remote computer, you must have administrative rights on that computer to write the registry values with sufficient permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定事件來源的組態屬性，從命令列引數。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 輸入引數會指定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱、 電腦名稱和事件訊息資源檔。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The computer name is invalid.

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MessageResourceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的訊息格式化字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the message resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
The path of the message resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定將當地語系化的事件訊息寫入事件記錄檔來源的屬性。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages. 事件訊息會描述使用者事件的應用程式定義字串。Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄檔項目使用的資源識別項。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers. 資源識別元編製索引中的訊息。A resource identifier indexes a message located in the . 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的訊息資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized message resource file based on current language settings. 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定事件來源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式寫入事件的訊息字串直接管理，而不是使用的資源識別項在當地語系化的資源檔，請勿設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the property. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您決定是否事件來源名為`SampleApplicationSource`登錄在本機電腦上。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最後，程式碼範例會將設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`中的資源檔路徑和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ParameterResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ParameterResourceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的訊息參數字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.
The path of the parameter resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定以使用當地語系化的事件訊息寫入事件記錄檔來源的屬性插入參數字串。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings. 指定在每個當地語系化的事件訊息屬性可包含插入字串的預留位置。Each localized event message specified in the property can contain placeholders for insertion strings. 這些預留位置會用來指定的位置和語言無關的字串，在事件訊息中的資源識別碼。These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message. 事件檢視器會填入預留位置使用中的對應字串及格式化當地語系化的事件項目在事件記錄檔訊息。The Event Viewer fills in the placeholders using the corresponding strings from the and formats the event log message for the localized event entry. 例如，訊息的文字檔案的下列區段會定義的參數預留位置的字串：For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` 在參數資源檔中，插入字串都必須定義資源識別項對應到預留位置，如下所示：Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定事件來源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式事件記錄檔中直接寫入事件的訊息字串，或如果您屬性不包含使用參數插入替代符號的訊息，則不會設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your property does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the property. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您決定是否事件來源名為`SampleApplicationSource`登錄在本機電腦上。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件來源不存在，此範例會設定為來源的訊息資源檔，並建立新的事件來源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最後，程式碼範例會將設定事件記錄檔，使用中的資源識別碼值的當地語系化的顯示名稱`DisplayNameMsgId`中的資源檔路徑和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具體而言，資源識別碼 1004年所定義的訊息會使用預留位置的資源識別碼 5002 所定義的參數字串。Specifically, the message defined for resource identifier 1004 uses a placeholder for a parameter string defined for resource identifier 5002. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

permission.span: 呼叫的任何成員以完全信任。

Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Source : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用事件記錄檔登錄為事件來源的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name to register with the event log as an event source.

value.span: 使用事件記錄檔登錄作為項目來源的名稱。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源名稱通常是應用程式名稱或大型應用程式內的元件名稱。The source name is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application. 方法會使用， ，和屬性，以建立新的來源和其相關聯的事件記錄檔的目標電腦上的登錄值。The method uses the , , and properties to create registry values on the target computer for the new source and its associated event log. 新的來源名稱不符合現有的來源名稱或在目標電腦上現有的事件記錄檔名稱。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name on the target computer. 建立來源的登錄值之後，您的應用程式可以使用來源設定的事件記錄檔中寫入項目。After the registry values for the source are created, your application can use the source to write entries to the configured event log. 每個來源只能寫入一個事件記錄檔一次;不過，您的應用程式也可以使用多個來源，以寫入多個事件記錄檔。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定事件來源的組態屬性，從命令列引數。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 輸入引數會指定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱、 電腦名稱和事件訊息資源檔。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]
